subject: From The Office of The Presi
body:
From The Office of The Presidency:
Ahmed Bola Tinubu
President Federal Republic of Nigeria.
Tell: +234-901-535-5647                                  
                                                                       URGENT ATTENTION FOR YOUR PAYMENT
Attention The Fund Beneficiary,
 
I decided to contact you by myself based on the Financial Security report reaching my office this week after the mandatory notice given to the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) to pay all Federal Government of Nigeria outstanding debt to all foreign and local contract/inheritance beneficiaries on or before the end of this Month.
 
The Financial Security report reaching my office from the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) this morning was that the bank has been trying all their possible best since last week to contact you and to confirm how you wish to receive your approved and processed payment sum of $10.5Million but all to no avail.
 
I am contacting you directly from my office because i approved your payment and issued a mandatory payment notice to the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) to release your outstanding overdue contract/inheritance payment sum of Ten Million, Five Hundred Thousand United States of America Dollars ($10,500,000.00) before the end of this month, based on my promise to the world leaders and international community during my Presidential Election Campaign.
 
My Government Administration want to make sure that all Foreign and Local fund beneficiaries receive all their outstanding payment base on my earlier promise and assurance to the United Nation (UN) and the world leaders during our last submit this year in New York and your approved payment sum of $10.5Million has been processed by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) and have been programmed into the paying bank Central Control Swift Wire Transfer System ready for onward remittance into your receiving bank account as the legitimate beneficiary of the $10.5Million, so in order for you to receive your fund now that your payment file is on my table for final payment, you are advice to re-confirm your receiving bank account details including your direct telephone number and call me on my direct telephone number below any time and i will take your call because of the limited time giving to finalize your payment.
 
Now that my government has approved funds from our Federal Oil Reserved Account to pay all abandoned payments to the fund beneficiaries, I want to assure you that the Central Bank of Nigeria will release your payment to you as soon as I hear from you.
 
Looking forward to hearing from you.
 
Regards,
 
President Ahmed Bola Tinubu,
Commander-in-chief
President Federal Republic of Nigeria.

subject: Re:   From The Office of The Presi
body:
Dear President Ahmed Bola Tinubu,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the financial security report and the release of my approved payment. I appreciate your personal involvement in ensuring that all foreign and local funds are received by their rightful recipients.

I understand that the Central Bank of Nigeria has been trying to contact me, but I apologize if I have missed any communication from them. Could you please provide more details about the process of receiving my payment? How should I proceed to ensure a smooth transaction?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the Federal Oil Reserved Account and how it is being utilized to pay all abandoned payments. It's interesting to hear about these initiatives taken by your government.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: From The President Urgent.
body:
From Office of The President: 
Ahmed Bola Tinubu 
President Federal Republic of Nigeria. 
Tell: +234-901-535-5647 
 
Attn:  Mary 
Fund Beneficiary, 
I received your message concerning your outstanding payment sum of US$10.5Million and during my verification over your payment I discovered that your outstanding payment sum of US$10.5Million is a Contract / Inheritance payment and the reason why you have not received your payment is because you have not submitted your Contract / Inheritance reference number which satisfy that your contract was fully executed and you are qualified to receive your payment. 
 
Forward to me immediately your complete contract inheritance reference number along with your complete personal details and a copy of your international passport or driver's license as soon as you receive this message to enable me complete the verification of your contract payment and order the immediate release of your fund to you without further delay. 
 
Mary, Call me on my telephone number below as soon as you read this message. 
Looking forward to hearing from you. 
 
Regards, 
 
President Ahmed Bola Tinubu, 
Commander-in-chief 
President Federal Republic of Nigeria 
Tell: +234-901-535-5647. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2024 at 5:48 PM From: "Mary" <re67278@***.com> To: ahmedbtinubu001@presidency.com Subject: Re: From The Office of The Presi 
 
Dear President Ahmed Bola Tinubu, 
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the financial security report and the release of my approved payment. I appreciate your personal involvement in ensuring that all foreign and local funds are received by their rightful recipients. 
I understand that the Central Bank of Nigeria has been trying to contact me, but I apologize if I have missed any communication from them. Could you please provide more details about the process of receiving my payment? How should I proceed to ensure a smooth transaction? 
Additionally, I would like to know more about the Federal Oil Reserved Account and how it is being utilized to pay all abandoned payments. It's interesting to hear about these initiatives taken by your government. 
Looking forward to your response.
Best wishes, 
Mary

subject: Re: From The President Urgent.
body:
Dear Mary,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am glad to hear that you are interested in receiving your approved payment. Rest assured, I will do everything in my power to ensure a smooth and hassle-free process for you.

To proceed with the release of your funds, I kindly request that you provide me with your complete contract reference number. This number is crucial as it confirms that your contract was fully executed and that you are eligible to receive your payment. Additionally, please send me your complete personal details and a copy of either your passport or driver's license for verification purposes.

Regarding the Federal Oil Reserved Account, it is a special account set up by the government to handle all abandoned payments. This ensures that these funds are properly utilized and disbursed to their rightful owners. It is part of our commitment to transparency and accountability in financial matters.

Once I receive the necessary information from you, I will personally oversee the completion of your contract payment and order the immediate release of your funds without any further delay. Please feel free to contact me directly on my telephone number if you have any further questions or concerns.

Thank you once again for your cooperation, Mary. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: FROM MR. PRESIDENT AHMED B. TINUBU VERY URGENT MR. BRANDON
body:
From Office of The President: 
Federal Republic of Nigeria 
His Excellency Ahmed Bola Tinubu 
GCFR 
Tell: +234-901-535-5647. 
 
Attn:  Mr.  Brandon 
Fund Beneficiary, 
 
Your payment have been approved and the processing of your fund transfer was completed this morning and the final transfer of your payment sum of US$10.5Million was suppose to be effected into your bank account this morning as processed and that was why you were requested to forward your Contract reference number to me so as to enable the transfer of your fund to freely flow into your bank account but  without the Contract reference number you can not receive your fund because the reference number is a sensitive document used for payment only. 
If you can not find your Contract reference number as a result of one reason or the other, you are therefore required to forward the following details below for the re-applying of issuing your Contract reference number to enable the transfer of your fund to be affected this week. 
Your full name, address, telephone number, receiving bank details, expected amount (US$10.5M) and copy of your international passport or driver's license and the official issuing charge will be made known to you as soon as the above required information is received from you. 
Looking forward to hearing from you.
Regards, 
 
President Ahmed Bola Tinubu, 
Commander-in-chief 
President Federal Republic of Nigeria 
Tell: +234-901-535-5647.

subject: Re: FROM MR. PRESIDENT AHMED B. TINUBU VERY URGENT MR. BRANDON
body:
Hello President Ahmed Bola Tinubu,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the approval and processing of my fund transfer. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that the transfer is completed smoothly.

I apologize for any inconvenience caused, but I seem to have misplaced my Contract reference number. Could you please provide me with more information about this number? What is its purpose and how can I obtain it?

Once I have a better understanding of the Contract reference number, I will be able to provide you with the necessary details you require for issuing it.

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: FROM MR. PRESIDENT AHMED B. TINUBU VERY URGENT.
body:
From Office of The President: 
Federal Republic of Nigeria 
His Excellency Ahmed Bola Tinubu 
GCFR. 
Tell: +234-901-535-5647. 
Attn: Mary 
Fund Beneficiary, 
URGENT ATTENTION FOR YOUR PAYMENT 
With regards to your email received concerning the obtaining of your Contract Reference Number which will enable the transfer of your fund to be completed. I have contacted the Ministry in charge of issuing the Contract Reference Number and their confirmed to me that their requirement for the issuing of the Contract Reference Number are as follows: Your name, address, ID, telephone number and their official issuing fee of $450, already you have sent your information which i will forward to them so go ahead and make the payment for the issuing fee of $450 to enable them issue you the Reference Number for the final release of your fund. 
Looking forward to hearing from you. 
 
Regards, 
 
President Ahmed Bola Tinubu, 
Commander-in-chief 
President Federal Republic of Nigeria. 
 
 
 Sent: Tuesday, February 13, 2024 at 6:14 PM From: "Mary" <re67278@***.com> To: ahmedbtinubu001@presidency.com Subject: Re: FROM MR. PRESIDENT AHMED B. TINUBU VERY URGENT MR. BRANDON 
 
Hello President Ahmed Bola Tinubu, 
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the approval and processing of my fund transfer. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that the transfer is completed smoothly. 
I apologize for any inconvenience caused, but I seem to have misplaced my Contract reference number. Could you please provide me with more information about this number? What is its purpose and how can I obtain it? 
Once I have a better understanding of the Contract reference number, I will be able to provide you with the necessary details you require for issuing it. 
Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.
Best wishes, 
Mary

subject: Re: FROM MR. PRESIDENT AHMED B. TINUBU VERY URGENT.
body:
Hello Mary,

Thank you for your response. I understand that you have misplaced your Contract Reference Number, and I apologize for any inconvenience caused. The Contract Reference Number is a unique identifier assigned to each contract or transaction. It helps in tracking and verifying the legitimacy of the funds being transferred.

To obtain the Contract Reference Number, we require some information from you. Please provide us with your full name, address, ID, and telephone number. Once we have this information, we will be able to proceed with issuing the Contract Reference Number.

Please note that there is an official issuing fee associated with obtaining the Contract Reference Number. The fee is already set at . Kindly make the payment for the issuing fee so that we can proceed with issuing you the reference number for the final release of your fund.

Once again, thank you for your cooperation. We look forward to receiving the required information and processing your fund transfer promptly.

Best wishes,
Mary
